ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Where in Kunark for 27 to 29? (was Charming)
ygData.msgSnippet: I m in Armigers of Mirth.  There is usually a group of Armigers hanging out at the windmill, the Hounted Tower, or the Sarnak castle most nights.  I ve been in
ygData.messageBody:
I'm in Armigers of Mirth. There is usually a group of Armigers hanging out
at the windmill, the Hounted Tower, or the Sarnak castle most nights. I've
been in Frontier Mountains lately hacking away at big giants. ;-)

On the other hand, Galtin's guild Disciples of Honor has an enormous number
of bards in it. I think we have only three, me at 29 still, Rylos at 25,
and a very young bard
whose name escapes me right now. We are working on organizing an alliance
with DoH to do those tougher things later on like Dragons etc.

Kit

I'm on E'ci playing around in the Lake of Ill Omen also, which guild are you
with?

Gilgurth
Bard of 24 Winces
E'ci
